reviewText: As described. Arrived in good condition.

This DVD is part of the Goodnight series and is an excellent horse and rider training tape. She delivers the information in a precise and professional format. She has a good attitude and never cuts down her viewers or clinic participants.
The information kepr coming and coming.  I found it such a great value.  I will definetly buy other Julie Goodnight videos.

Julie Goodnight is a excellent teacher. The way she explains things is so understanding. She doesn't just tell you, she shows you how and then she tells you how to do it as you're on the horse and it makes sense as she says...does that make sense?? This is my first of all her DVD's. I also watch all of her youtubes. I just wish I could get her on my TV company!!!
